actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to designate the week of June 20, 1982, through June 27, 1982, as "National Safety in the Workplace Week".

summary.text: Requests the President to designate the week of June 20 through June 27, 1982, as National Safety in the Workplace Week to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the American Society of Safety Engineers.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to designate the week of June 20, 1982, through June 27, 1982, as "National Safety in the Workplace Week".
